title: Alpha Client
body: Such unluckiness. After waiting months and months for the Alpha client I finally get accepted in but the issue is that the Alpha client is ending soon T_T that timing doe.                                {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: oooh so un-lucky, but oh well the old client is gonna get replaced soon anyways so I guess you won't miss out on anything
yeah, I just uninstalled it, although I could reinstall, don't feel like I need to, will get the beta soon
Yeah nothing really beneficial, just a new clean look. Whelp, I spent like an hour and half downloading the alpha only to replace the old one soon
